attachments.fallback:
[July 21st, 2017 3:52 PM] iamewald: So even in their, or any client's, misalignment — say for instance between a robot dude and a human centered researcher who just wants to research — they're walking on _our_ path. It's a different one than they thought they were on, but lovely nonetheless. 

And, if they didn't need us, they'd have built "it" by now on their own.
attachments.text:
So even in their, or any client's, misalignment — say for instance between a robot dude and a human centered researcher who just wants to research — they're walking on _our_ path. It's a different one than they thought they were on, but lovely nonetheless. 

And, if they didn't need us, they'd have built "it" by now on their own.

text: <@U0914MEN7|james> pinned a message to this channel.
